text: wjel subhanah fi al'ard jbala thwabt min fwqha, wabarak fiha fjelha dayimat alkhayr lahlha, wqddar fiha arzaq 'ahliha min alghdha', wama yslhhm min almeash fi tamam arbet ayam: ywman khalaq fihima alard, wywman jaeal fiha rawasi waqadar fiha aqwatha, sawa'an lilsaayilin ay: liman 'arad alsuwal ean dhlk; lyelmh
